    Why Film Quality Matters

    Not All Wrap Film Is Created Equal

    The wrap film industry is flooded with budget brands that promise the world but deliver cracking, fading, and adhesive failure within months — especially in Miami's brutal UV and heat. At Bespoke Auto Design, we focus on sourcing only premium-grade cast vinyl films from trusted manufacturers with proven track records in extreme climates.

    Cheaper alternatives use inferior calendered vinyl with aggressive adhesives that crack under Miami's sun within 6–12 months. The cost savings disappear when the wrap fails prematurely and needs replacement.

    Premium Materials

    Brands We Trust

    We work with the industry's leading film manufacturers — here are a few of the brands we frequently use.

    3M™ 2080 Series

    The Industry Standard

    3M invented the automotive wrap film category and remains the gold standard. The 2080 Series features Controltac™ pressure-activated adhesive with Comply™ air-release channels, making it the easiest film to install cleanly on complex curves. Backed by 3M's unmatched MCS™ warranty, this film delivers consistent color, conformability, and longevity that no competitor can match.

    • Controltac™ repositionable adhesive
    • Comply™ air-release channels
    • 3M MCS™ Matched Component warranty
    • 100+ color & finish options
    • Non-visible removal for up to 3 years

    Avery Dennison® Supreme Wrapping Film

    Supreme Conformability

    Avery Dennison Supreme Wrapping Film (SWF) is engineered with Easy Apply RS™ technology — a dual-layer adhesive system that allows sliding repositionability followed by a strong, permanent bond. The result is bubble-free, crease-free installations even on the most aggressive body lines. Avery's color palette is renowned for its depth, vibrancy, and trend-forward finishes.

    • Easy Apply RS™ dual-layer adhesive
    • Supreme conformability on deep recesses
    • Long-term removability without residue
    • Trend-forward colors & special finishes
    • Manufacturer-backed performance warranty

    KPMF Premium Wrapping Films

    British Precision Engineering

    KPMF, a Kay Premium Marking Films brand from the UK, is the choice of elite wrap shops worldwide. Their Airelease™ liner technology and pressure-sensitive adhesive system delivers exceptional conformability and clean removal. KPMF is especially known for their exclusive specialty finishes — matte metallics, iridescent sheens, and pearlescent effects that are simply unavailable from other manufacturers.

    • Airelease™ air-egress liner technology
    • Exclusive specialty finishes & textures
    • Superior conformability on compound curves
    • Clean, residue-free removal
    • Preferred by competition-level installers
    Why Wrap?

    Benefits of a Color Change Wrap

    A professional vinyl wrap lets you fully customize your vehicle's appearance — without the permanence of paint.

    Unlimited Color Options

    Choose from hundreds of colors across gloss, matte, satin, metallic, chrome, carbon fiber, brushed metal, and color-shifting finishes. Achieve looks that are impossible or prohibitively expensive with traditional paint.

    Unique Finishes & Textures

    From satin chrome to color-shifting chameleon, from brushed titanium to candy gloss — vinyl wrap finishes go far beyond what automotive paint can achieve, giving your vehicle a truly bespoke, head-turning look.

    Fully Reversible

    Unlike a full respray, vinyl wraps can be professionally removed without damaging your factory paint. Change colors as often as you like, or restore the original finish when it's time to sell.

    Stand Out From the Crowd

    Your vehicle should be as unique as you are. A custom color change wrap lets you express your personality — whether it's a subtle satin shift or an eye-catching chrome finish that commands attention.

    Faster Than Paint

    A professional color change wrap takes 3–5 days compared to 2–4 weeks for a quality respray. Less downtime means you're back on the road sooner with a finish that rivals — or exceeds — the look of paint.

    Resale Value Preservation

    Wrapping instead of repainting keeps your vehicle's factory finish intact — a critical factor for luxury and exotic cars where original paint condition directly impacts resale and collector value.

    Built for Miami's Climate

    Premium cast vinyl films are engineered with UV-stabilized pigments and protective overlaminates that resist fading, even under Miami's relentless sun exposure with UV indices exceeding 11.

    Warranty-Backed Quality

    Every film we use comes with a manufacturer warranty and documented performance guarantees — and so do we with our installation craftsmanship.

    Comparison

    Vinyl Wrap vs. Full Respray

    See why more Miami luxury car owners choose vinyl wraps over traditional repaints.

    FeatureFull ResprayVinyl Wrap
    Cost$5,000–$15,000+$3,500–$7,500
    Timeline2–4 weeks3–5 days
    ReversibilityPermanentFully removable
    Factory PaintDestroyedPreserved & protected
    Finish OptionsLimited to paintHundreds of colors & textures
    Resale ImpactCan reduce valuePreserves/increases value
    UV ProtectionNone (paint fades)Built-in UV stabilizers
    DurabilityPermanent but chips5–7 years, self-healing options
    Our Process

    How We Wrap Your Vehicle

    Every wrap follows a meticulous 5-step process to ensure a flawless, long-lasting finish.

    01

    Design Consultation

    We begin with a one-on-one consultation to understand your vision. Browse our extensive color library, review finish samples in person, and see digital mockups of your vehicle in your chosen color before committing.

    02

    Surface Preparation

    Your vehicle undergoes a meticulous multi-stage preparation: full hand wash, clay bar decontamination, isopropyl alcohol wipe-down, and removal of all badges, trim, and hardware that could interfere with seamless film application.

    03

    Precision Installation

    Our certified installers apply the film panel by panel using heat guns and squeegees to ensure perfect conformability around curves, recesses, and body lines. Every edge is post-heated and sealed for long-term durability.

    04

    Detail & Reassembly

    All removed trim, badges, and hardware are reinstalled. Every seam and edge is inspected under studio lighting. We perform a final quality check to ensure color consistency, adhesion, and a factory-finished appearance.

    05

    Aftercare Briefing

    We walk you through proper care and maintenance: recommended wash techniques, products to avoid, and tips to maximize the life of your wrap. You leave with a care guide and our direct line for any questions.

    WHY BESPOKE

    Why Choose Bespoke for Wraps

    Premium Film Only

    We source exclusively from 3M, Avery Dennison, and KPMF — the three most trusted names in cast vinyl. No budget films, no shortcuts, no exceptions.

    Exotic Vehicle Expertise

    Complex body lines on supercars and luxury vehicles demand advanced technique. Our 7+ years of experience means confident, flawless installations on even the most aggressive curves.

    3–5 Day Turnaround

    A full color change wrap is completed in 3–5 days — significantly faster than a quality respray, with less downtime and a fully reversible result.

    Warranty-Backed Craftsmanship

    Every wrap includes a manufacturer warranty on film plus our installation warranty against peeling, lifting, and edge failure.
